ValidationRule.description: Only the Role VMM can change Inbound Content to Waiting on Client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "0124A000001UU0Q", ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Waiting on Client Approval"), ISCHANGED(Status__c), $UserRole.Id <> "00EG0000000Fmlu", $UserRole.Id <> "00E4A000001GgPl", $UserRole.Id <> "00E4A000001G2Le", $User.Id <> "005G00000084Gww", $User.Id <> "0054A000009Bgtq" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have the correct permissions to change status to Waiting on Client Approval.
